section.title: Documentation testing
section.para: Very much users want to contribute to the project with some kind of documentation. They can do this in the wiki. By writing documentation into the wiki, other users could read the text and try it. When there is something wrong, they could change it in the wiki.

When some article or tutorial in the wiki is usefull to get in the documentation that comes with the Code::Blocks package, documentation authors could edit the wiki article and put them into the docbook format.
